content: use this little star pattern as a toy keychain ornament bunting and anything else you can think of my daughter loved it on her backpack if you re interested in the little bear in the photo i used this terrific free pattern http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/teddybear-keychain supplies hook size 3 5 mm / e/4 light or medium worsted i doubled a light worsted stuffing material 6 mm solid black plastic safety eyes abbreviations r round magic_ring magic_ring st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tc triple crochet
